message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair deal for the first round, Bob. Let's not waste time with inflation.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor.  We both lose if this drags on.
Bob, it's clear we both want this money. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We're losing money with every round!
